data.message: at first i was a fan of pitbull. after hearing not afraid of eminem i thought pitbull is nothing in front of eminem. eminem got one gift. and, that is his voice. he got the best voice for rap.

replies.message: Please don't use eminem and pitbull in the same sentence ever again, thanks.
maybe, u haven't heard about his award.
You don't like his voice, but apparently you listen to his music.

Aaron Sciortino.
He's got a song on The Eminem Show in which he sang pretty decent. 
I admit Stronger Than I Was wasn't that good.
Bottomline is, he's a rapper. Not a fuckin' singer. And he's got a great, aggressive voice for rap.

Kalem Ullaah Babar i agree I've listened to eminem a lot lately and i think he is a great rapper just last year I thought he was terrible because of stronger than i was but I got into eminem a lot since then and i love his music now

Great to know man. 👌
Listening to Stronger Than I Was right now. 😂
The verse after the singing part is fire. 🔥🔥
